mapper.select: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM work_date) AS year, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '지각' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tardyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '조퇴' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS earlyLeaveCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '결근' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS absenteeismCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '연차' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vacationCount FROM attendance WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM work_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM work_date) ORDER BY year DESC

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM work_date) AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '지각' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tardyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '조퇴' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS earlyLeaveCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '결근' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS absenteeismCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '연차' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vacationCount, SUM(work_hours) AS workHours, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status != '결근' THEN work_date END) AS workDays FROM attendance WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND YEAR(work_date) = #{year} GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM work_date) ORDER BY month
SELECT SUM(work_hours) FROM attendance WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND YEAR(work_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT work_date) FROM attendance WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND YEAR(work_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
